title: Real-World Data Breaches and Incidents
excerpt: Provides context on notable real-world data breaches and security violations in the Philippines, including the COMELEC hack and recent incidents involving major companies.

full_content.heading: Real-World Data Breaches in the Philippines (Context)
full_content.intro: Notable real-world data breaches and security violations in the country:
points: COMELEC Database Hack: Exposed records of more than 55 million voters.
Jollibee: Investigated a data breach affecting 32 million customers (June 2024).
Cebuana Lhuillier: A breach affected around 900,000 clients via an email server.
APTs: Campaigns like LuminousMoth have been observed targeting Philippine entities.
